tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  TEST HEAVY  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: I had him for chem 120. It was an easy class but you have to read the text book and make sure you come to class. Most of the test stuff comes from lecture and some from the book. He won\'t throw any irrelevant materials on the exams.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Organic 2 is NOT a simple subject and this teacher did not make it any better. He is very difficult and his grading is very hard. He takes of 5 points for simple mistakes. He is very hard and you have to work extremely hard to get an A. If you are not good with chemistry and need a good grade DO NOT take him because he won\'t make it easy for you.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: IF you need to take a lab class take it with him. He is very helpful and there was a lab final that was very similar to the labs we wrote up! Take him to get a good grade :D

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I must say out of all the organic chem professors he is the best. Gangian is harder then him and he does not curve. O\'Connor cares about his students and wants us to succeed. If you need to take organic chem take O\'Connor. There are no surprises his sample exam is similar to the actual exam. Study hard and you will succeed

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: This was his first time teaching general chemistry lab, but he was pretty good. His quizzes were almost give aways compared to the other lab classes. He is helpful to an extent but I suggest you know your stuff before you go into class.

comments: do not take him! not even for the lab! worse teacher at lehman, wonder who hired him? he knows nothing and thinks he is funny.

comments: Worst professor ever!!! Never answer questions.Don\'t respond to emails. useless, unprofessional. DO NOT TAKE HIM. Average grade d- . Sample test NOTHING like the exam.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: GIVE SLIDES AT THE BEGINNING OF CLASS SO YOU DONT NEED TO GO TO CLASS ALL HE DOES IS READ THEM OVER! NEVER ANSWERS QUESTIONS, TWO TEST AND A FINAL, HALF THE CLASS DROPPED! WASTE OF TIME AND GRADE, I LEARNED MORE ON YOUTUBE THAN HIM! NEEDS ANOTHER JOB!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: You need to do the suggested problems. -For the lecture, study his notes, go over the book for clarification. Do problems. Don\'t listen to the horror stories abut orgo. Don\'t even make friends in this class, they will make you paranoid. I can sit down with you and circle every powerpoint slide that was based on an exam question. He is fair.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: This professor is knowledgeable of his area content, however, his tests are tricky and the point are not distributed evenly on the test. His notes are really watered down, so that if you depend on his notes alone, you are bound to fail. His lab on the other hand is not bad at all. I will only recommend him for his lab. A "no" for his lecture.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: He\'s a new professor and he\'s getting use to the whole teaching thing. His exams are very clear, no tricks. He goes over everything on his exams during lecture and he\'s very helpful during office hours. Hes a cool person outside class but when it comes to grades hes strictly ur professor alone; hes fair.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Overall great professor and has a strong interest in having his students do well. Like an orgo class, if you don\'t keep up with this stuff, you\'ll be left out to dry. It\'s not an easy A, but it\'s not impossible either. You just have to put in the time.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: i had him for the lab and he is so easy!!!!u just follow the format for ur report and u\'ll get that A!!!!doesn\'t care much for the calculation....i recommned him for the lab!!!!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: read over the notes everything is there, doesnt care much for textbook, no tricks on exams. love him love the class

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: his homework problems show up exacly on the exams, and attendance is a huge part of your grade. if you come to lab, do the hw and show you care, you\'ll get an A, i did :)

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: As an Organic chem prof he\'s a failure...you think he is cool and fun to talk to but not a good educator. His review sheets are not helpful because the real exams are much harder.
